ovdesc.p: Application used for Bulk upload processing. This can be inputted through generic upload or manual.
This application hold individual payment details of the Bulk upload. It can be created when the corresponding FT.BULK.MASTER exists.

desc.p: This field indicates the status of an item.
Following are the values updated in this field,
Values allowed for user input,
CREATED – When an item is first inputted
REJECTED – To reject a payment
System updated status,
ERROR – If there is any error during validation or during FT/DD item creation
READY – If there is no error during validation service and ready for payment
PROCESSED – If FT or DD item is created for this Bulk Item, then gets updated with this status
Tirgger field to update TOTLA.AMOUNT in the BULK.MASTER field.
Valid inputs – YES or NULL
This field indicates the bank sort code. If SORT.CODE entered then account number is treated as other bank account.
Valid sort code in BC.SORT.CODE.
SORT.CODE when inputted should not be the Bank’s own SORT.CODE.
This field indicates whether the account specified is a T24 account or other Bank account. If T24 account it will be updated as INTERNAL else it will be NULL.
No Input Field
Updated by System.
This field is used to indicate the errors that occur during validation and payment process.
NoInput Field
Updated by System.
This field indicates the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed.
This will override the transaction type from Bulk Update Type file.
Valid record in TXN.TYPE.CONDITION
Optional Input
This field indicates the value date that is going to be used in the entry raised for Credit/Debit.
Defaulted from Bulk Master Payment Value Date field.
SINGLE type Bulk it should be same as PAYMENT.VALUE.DATE in BULK.MASTER.
MULTI type bulk it can be greater than or equal to the PAYMENT.VALUE.DATE in the BULK.MASTER
This field indicates whether the Bulk item record is inputted manually by the user or uploaded from a file.
System Updated field. Default is NULL and will be updated as Manual if manually inputted.
This field is used to specify the payment Id. Reference for send / release of payment.
NoInput Field
Updated by System.
NoInput Field
Updated by System.
This field indicates the customer of the account to whom the fund is going to be Credit/Debit.
Value for this field is defaulted for T24 accounts. For other bank account’s, input is mandatory.
This field indicates the currency in which the fund is going to be Debit/Credit.
Currency should be same as currency given in Bulk Master
Valid Currency in Currency table.
Mandatory Input
Hold the Account details that is going to send / release payments. Should be in the Currency of the Bulk.
Valid T24 account or if other bank account then SORT.CODE field is mandatory.

Valid Bulk Master Id.
